title: Mutekitekki Spin-chan
original_name: 無敵鉄姫スピンちゃん
sinopse:
It will be the first year of high school for Tooru and as such, she decided to go live with her grandpa to be close to school. But it turns out that the old man is a robot engineer with a peculiar dream... for which he created the robot assistant Spin! What will happen to Tooru from now on!?

(Source: Shueisha, translated)
